text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Chasing after a budding racer was<n>not my brightest idea.
I've completely<n>lost sight of her... Her distressed<n>
expression still vivid in my mind, I<n>continue my search.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her enthusiasm completely backfired<n>today. Between being
late, tripping<n>during her run, and causing Opera O to<n>have a
near-death experience...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Worried, I search the academy<n>grounds. After what feels
like half an<n>hour...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff, puff!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I... I can do better... I will dobetter! For Opera O!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I have to run properly on the day of<n>the race... Th-then...
maybe someday<n>I'll... O-one more lap!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Raaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Meisho Doto wipes the tears from<n>her puffy, reddened
eyes and makes<n>a dash for the riverside.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thud!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eeeaargh?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...Only to fall into a ditch.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: That could've been bad... Thank you...Sniff...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Yes... I'm, um... kinda used to fallingat this point... Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: ...Why am I... like this?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her clothes are completely covered in<n>mud, and it's already
quite late. Just<n>as I'm about to urge her to return<n>home,
she raises her head.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I... have to try harder! Yeah! Time for<n>some long-distance
running!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah, I'm s-s-sorry! Is that a...<n>problem?
choice_data_list: I'm just surprised by how hardworking you are.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
N-no, not at all! I'd say I'm more,<n>um... stubborn than
hardworking...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I think about quitting, I just<n>start remembering...
and I start feeling<n>like maybe... just maybe... even I<n>can—

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh? Um... It's not a very exciting<n>story...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
It happened a long time ago, when I<n>went to see my first G1
race... The<n>racers, the crowd, the very race itself<n>was just
so... magical.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
At first, I thought of it all as a<n>completely different world...
One where<n>someone like me could never exist...<n>until I
heard the winner's speech.

text_block_list.name: G1 Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I used to have no confidence in<n>myself. I truly believed I
could do<n>nothing right... But as I started winning<n>races, I
began to see myself in a new<n>light.

text_block_list.name: G1 Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Now, after winning such an amazing<n>race, I can sincerely
say that I love<n>myself!

text_block_list.name: Young Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Does... Does that mean that if I try<n>hard enough, I can
change too?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
After that, I got all excited and applied<n>for Tracen Academy...
And somehow I<n>got in. Ahaha...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... I-I know I'm a klutz, and<n>nothing I do ever turns out
right... But I<n>still have a hard time telling when it's<n>time to
give up...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I keep hoping that if I keep trying,<n>someday I'll be like that
winner back<n>then... or maybe even a majestic<n>racer like
Opera O...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
And before I knew it, it became even<n>harder to give up... So
not only am I a<n>klutz, I'm a stupid one at that...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Meisho Doto's already hard on<n>herself by default, but
she's even<n>worse today. It's clear she sees<n>herself in a
negative light, but...
choice_data_list: Isn't not giving up a good thing?
Isn't not giving up a good thing?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today was an indisputable disaster,<n>but even then, she's
out here<n>preparing for the Tracen Meet. To me,<n>that takes
true grit.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh? A g-good thing? S-s-sorry, I<n>must've misheard you...
choice_data_list: I think tenacity's one of your strong points.
I think tenacity's one of your strong points.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I didn't mishear you?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
U-um... A-a-are you sure about that? I<n>mean... all I'm doing
is just trudging<n>along, not knowing when to give up...
choice_data_list: Not everyone can do that, you know.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I-I'm not so sure about that...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: ...Ehehe, I'm glad you think so,<n>though...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
A-anyway, I, ummm... I think I'm<n>going to run a little more
before going<n>back to the dorm! H-have a good<n>night!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Meisho Doto runs off into the<n>distance, I can feel a faint
strength<n>coming from her unlike anything I've<n>ever felt
before.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Here I go!
